Package projectone.demo.controller

Class CashierController

java.lang.Object
projectone.demo.controller.CashierController
@RequestMapping("/cashierPage") @Controller public class CashierController extends Object
Controller for handling cashier operations.

      CashierController(ProductsRepository repository, OrdersRepository ordersRepository, OrderProductsRepo orderProductsRepo, ProductInventoryRepository productInventoryRepository, InventoryRepository inventoryRepository)

      repository - the products repository
      ordersRepository - the orders repository
      orderProductsRepo - the order products repository
      productInventoryRepository - the product inventory repository

    • add

      @PostMapping("/add") public String add(@RequestParam("price") String price, @RequestParam("productId") String ids, org.springframework.ui.Model orderModel, org.springframework.ui.Model orderProductsModel)
      Processes the addition of a new order with specified product IDs and price.
      Parameters:
      price - the total price of the order
      ids - the product IDs for the order
      orderModel - model for the orders table
      orderProductsModel - model for the order products table
      Returns:
      redirect string to refresh the cashier page
